translation.en: Uh, yeah, and that's why I have to get on the phone in the next four minutes
translation.es: Sí. Y debo hacer una llamada en cuatro minutos

translation.en: to figure out who did this to me.
We know who did it.
What I'm about to show you was captured by our security cameras in the garage.
translation.es: Le mostraré lo que grabaron nuestras cámaras en el estacionamiento.

translation.en: At approximately 3:36 a.m., this sedan pulled in the parking structure.
translation.es: Alrededor de las 3:36 a.m., este auto se estacionó allí.

translation.en: - Vicky? - Were you with this woman last night?
No.
But she did have a key to my room
translation.es: Pero tenía llave de mi cuarto

translation.en: because she was the one that made the reservations.
Her parking pass correlates to one of the rooms
translation.es: Su recibo es de uno de los cuartos

translation.en: that was booked 30 minutes prior.
In it, we found several rolls of duct tape.
translation.es: Allí hallamos mucha cinta de embalar.

translation.en: Duct tape?
Here's where it gets ridiculous.
Several keys got stuck in the gears, trapping you inside.
translation.es: Las llaves se atoraron en el engranaje, y quedó atrapado.

translation.en: I need to use your phone right now.
translation.es: Necesito usar su teléfono de inmediato.

translation.en: - Hello. - Meg?
Rob! Where are you? Are you okay?
Listen, I don't have a lot of time to talk.
I just want to tell you that I am sorry.
translation.es: Solo quería decirte que lo siento.

translation.en: I've been stuck.
I've just been holding on to a bunch of bullshit,
and you haven't gotten what you needed from me.
It's kind of like with your kids, you know, your patients.
translation.es: Es como con los niños, tus pacientes.

translation.en: You say they grow up fast when they're dealing with a crisis.
translation.es: Dices que crecen rápido al tener una crisis.

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, I've been dealing with a crisis of unimaginable proportions,
translation.es: Yo he tenido una crisis de proporciones inimaginables

translation.en: and I just want to tell you that I am...
I am getting out my own damn way.
So you stay right there.
I'm coming for you.
And here comes Abdalla Tanui of Kenya,
translation.es: Aquí viene Abdalla Tanui de Kenia,

translation.en: rounding the corner for the final quarter mile.
translation.es: dando vuelta a la esquina del último medio km.

translation.en: Last one there is a rotten egg.
translation.es: El último es un huevo podrido.

translation.en: Guys, please. I got to get to the church. I got to get to the church. Excuse me.
translation.es: Chicos, por favor. Tengo que ir a la iglesia. Disculpen.

translation.en: Officers, I need a ride to my wedding.
translation.es: Necesito un aventón a mi boda.

translation.en: Move along, Nick Cannon.
No, I know it sounds crazy, but I really need your help.
translation.es: Suena loco, pero necesito su ayuda.

translation.en: She's the love of my life, and I know she'd take a bullet for me.
translation.es: Es el amor de mi vida. Recibiría un tiro por mí.

translation.en: She's my ride or die bitch.
translation.es: Es mi perra leal a muerte.

translation.en: - Let's roll. - Yes!
Wait. How the hell are we supposed to get across town
translation.es: ¿Cómo llegaremos con la carrera y el tráfico?

translation.en: - with the race and the traffic? - I got an idea.
translation.es: ¿Cómo llegaremos con la carrera y el tráfico? Tengo una idea.

translation.en: Almost went around the thing
- and flipped over. - We almost... went around.
Watch out!
- - Relax. We got this. We're professionals. We do this all the time.
Why are you so nervous?
Oh, snap. Guys, can I use your phone?
Look at your own risk.
I promise you I won't.
- Hello. - Hey, Callie!
Yeah, it's me, Rob, from last night.
- Corny Rob. - Yeah, yeah, yeah, Corny Rob.
translation.es: - Rob el cursi. - Sí, el cursi.

translation.en: Corny Rob? Yeah, I need you to do me a favor.
Grab my suit,
bring it down to the Second Presbyterian Church. ASAP.
translation.es: y llévalo a la iglesiaSecond Presbyterian.

translation.en: - All right. - All right, bye.
Whoo! Someone's getting married!
We're never gonna make it in time.
- I think these guys know a shortcut. - Yeah?
Let's go!
- I'll walk. Thank you. - No, doors are locked.
translation.es: - Mejor camino. - Las puertas tienen traba.

translation.en: - Not getting out of here, baby. - Ride or die.
Sweetheart, you have to accept the fact that he's not coming.
translation.es: Cariño, tienes que aceptar que no vendrá.

translation.en: He will be here.
He's here.
He's here!
Yes! Whoo! My man's in the house! Come on, everybody, give it up!
- You look good, man. - Thank you, brother.
Wow.
You look amazing.
Sir, I'd like to thank you for hosting such a wonderful service.
translation.es: Señor, quiero agradecerle por un servicio tan maravilloso.

translation.en: It's a complete disaster,
and I think it should be canceled.
You'd rather her marry Cody.
As a matter of fact, he's the kind of man my baby girl deserves.
translation.es: Pues sí. Es el tipo de hombre que mi nena se merece.

translation.en: Yeah. And he's also the kind of man that's planning to take over your company.
translation.es: Sí. Y también es quien está planeando adquirir su compañía.

translation.en: Yeah, that's right.
He's bought up 47% of your shares and has a lead on another five.
translation.es: Compró el 47% de sus acciones y está por comprar cinco más.

translation.en: Now, I know I'm just a substitute teacher, but...
sounds to me like you're screwed.
translation.es: pero creo que lo está jodiendo.

translation.en: Cody, is this true?
You always treated me like garbage.
Worse than garbage.
It wasn't until Megan and I broke up that you could even remember my name.
translation.es: No retuviste mi nombre hasta que Megan y yo terminamos.

translation.en: I have been waiting for this moment for years.
translation.es: He esperado este momento por años.

translation.en: I'm sorry I can't take everything that's important to you.
translation.es: Solo lamento no poder arrebatarte todo.

translation.en: Congratulations, you two.
- Man, I ought to knock your ass out. - Hey, Benny, chill.
translation.es: - Voy a partirte la cara. - Tranquilo.

translation.en: - He got a mean left hook. - Oh, for real? I'm good.
translation.es: - Tiene un buen gancho izquierdo. - ¿Sí? Bueno.

translation.en: I'm sorry, baby girl. I've got to deal with this now.
translation.es: Disculpa, nena. Tengo que ocuparme de esto.

translation.en: - No. - Mr. Swope...
I got it. Give me a second.
Back off, Rob. This is important.
translation.es: No te metas, Rob. Es importante.

translation.en: More important than your own daughter's wedding?
translation.es: ¿Más que la boda de su hija?

translation.en: Look, I don't expect you to understand.
You haven't worked a real job in your life.
translation.es: Nunca has tenido un trabajo de verdad.

translation.en: Here's what I do know, Mr. Swope.
translation.es: Pero sé una cosa, Sr. Swope.

translation.en: Marriage is a full- time job.
translation.es: El matrimonio es de tiempo completo.

translation.en: I'm talking long hours.
Overtime.
No summers off.
Listen, I promise you I'm gonna give Megan everything that I have.
translation.es: Escuche, le prometo que le daré todo de mí a Megan.

translation.en: I'll never stop proving myself.
And I'll never ever stop loving her.
I promised her mother the same thing.
translation.es: Le prometí lo mismo a su madre.

translation.en: Oh, God, I wish she were here.
She is...
Dad.
Okay... too soon.
Uh... What do you say we go back inside?
Come on, work can wait.
Megan needs her father.
And a groom.
Apparently, that's how this whole wedding thing works, right?
Rob, thank you for what you did.
translation.es: Rob, gracias por lo que hiciste.

translation.en: Cody's a liar and a cheat. I'm just glad I'm the one that caught him.
translation.es: Cody es un mentiroso. Me alegra haberlo descubierto.

translation.en: I'm not talking about Cody.
If there's any way I can possibly repay you...
Well...
And now we come to the portion of the ceremony
that holds great significance, the vows.
I understand you two have written your own?
Yes.
Megan, would you like to begin?
Actually, Father...
May I?
Megan... I know I haven't made it easy for you.
translation.es: Megan, sé que no te he hecho las cosas fáciles.

translation.en: And I know I haven't been the man... that you deserve.
translation.es: Y sé que no he sido el hombre que te mereces.

translation.en: But all the time leading up to this moment...
is exactly what I needed to put all my nonsense behind me.
translation.es: ...fue justo lo que necesitaba para dejar las tonterías atrás.

translation.en: Someone once said it takes 10,000 hours...
to master anything...
but that's a long time to keep a beautiful woman waiting.
translation.es: Pero una mujer hermosa no puede esperar tanto.

translation.en: And, Megan, you have waited a long time.
translation.es: Y Megan, tú has esperado por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: But I promise you this:
if marriage is like playing the lottery...
translation.es: si casarse es como jugar a la lotería,

translation.en: I'm in it to win it.
Oh, Rob.
I know the man that you are.
And all I need you to be is right here, right now.
translation.es: Y me basta que estés conmigo ahora.

translation.en: Always.
Megan, will you have this man to be your husband,
translation.es: Megan, ¿aceptas a este hombre como tu esposo?

translation.en: to love and to comfort,
to honor and to keep in sickness and in health
translation.es: en la salud y en la enfermedad,

translation.en: for as long as you both shall live?
translation.es: todos los días de tu vida?

translation.en: I do.
And do you, Robert?
Yes, I do.
Rob, the ring?
My mother's ring?
Thank you.
Is there anybody here who does not wish these two to be married?
translation.es: ¿Hay alguien que se oponga a este matrimonio?

translation.en: Let them speak now or forever hold their peace.
translation.es: Si es así, que hable ahora o calle para siempre.

translation.en: Rob slept with a hooker!
It just had to come out.
Um... I have pictures of them leaving a bar together, so it's a true story.
translation.es: Tengo fotos de los dos saliendo juntos de un bar. Es verdad.

translation.en: Wait, what is this about, Rob?
I did not sleep with a hooker, okay?
I just brought her back, and she listened to my vows.
translation.es: Le pedí ayuda con mis votos.

translation.en: - - And actually, she was very helpful.
translation.es: Y me ayudó mucho, la verdad.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. That sounds plausible.
Unfortunately, the hooker couldn't be here to corroborate your story.
translation.es: Pero la prostituta no pudo estar aquí para corroborar tu historia.

translation.en: Well, actually, the young lady... is right over there.
translation.es: De hecho, la señorita está allá.

translation.en: Callie? Can you please tell them?
- Yes, please do! - She paid me to try and sleep with him.
translation.es: - ¡Sí, por favor! - Ella me pagó por acostarme con él.

translation.en: Okay, let's all believe a hooker.
translation.es: Claro, hay que creerle a una prostituta.

translation.en: Hello, Hooker. It's Vicky.
Just making sure you'll be at The Glass Slipper tonight
translation.es: Quería asegurarme que fueras al bar

translation.en: to do the do with Rob Anderson.
That is R- O- B.
translation.es: R- O- B, por si acaso.

translation.en: Yeah, that checks out.
I want my $300 back.
Wait, Vicky, why would you do this?
Yeah, why would you do this, Vicky?
Wha-- he broke my heart.
- What? - Yes.
We had one date together, a magical night.
translation.es: Salimos una vez y fue una noche mágica.

translation.en: And, yes, did I smell a little bit?
translation.es: Y sí, yo apestaba un poco.

translation.en: But I have been to a doctor since then, and it has cleared up significantly,
translation.es: Pero ya fui al médico y mejoró mucho.

translation.en: hardly detectable.
But you? You get him for the rest of your life, Miss I Smell Like Flowers?
translation.es: ¿Y tú lo tendrás el resto de la vida, Srta. Aroma Floral?

translation.en: That is not fair.
- Ma'am. - What?
Are you aware solicitation is a felony in South Carolina?
translation.es: Solicitar sexo por dinero es delito en Carolina del Sur.

translation.en: Okay, don't arrest me. She's the hooker.
translation.es: Pero no me arresten a mí. Ella es la prostituta.

translation.en: Yeah, but you're the one that's going down.
I'm assuming you want to press charges on this one, right, Rob?
translation.es: Supongo que vas a presentar cargos.

translation.en: You know, I don't think so.
If it wasn't for Vicky, I wouldn't be standing here right now.
translation.es: Si no fuese por Vicky, no estaría aquí.

translation.en: So I'll just chalk it up to insanity.
translation.es: Voy a atribuirlo a la locura.

translation.en: Okay.
However, I would like you to leave.
translation.es: Pero sí me gustaría que te fueras.

translation.en: Okay, I will see myself out.
I am not holding these anymore. Carpal tunnel.
translation.es: Al diablo con esto. Túnel carpiano.

translation.en: - Let's go. - Don't touch me.
I'll take those, darling.
Father? Now, can we skip to the end, please?
All right, then.
I now pronounce you husband and wife!
We're married! We're married!
- We're married! - We're married!
I'm gonna get it, though. Hey, baby. How you doing, man?
- Come on and see me, now. - I will, man.
Hey, baby.
You look pretty. I like that you dressed for the occasion.
translation.es: Te ves muy bien. Me alegra que te pusieras elegante.

translation.en: Thank you for having us.
- You must be Mrs. Right. - Yes.
You're a vision, beautiful. That's for her.
- Nice. - Rob, who are all these people?
Oh, its just a few friends I met on the way to the wedding.
translation.es: Unos amigos que conocí de camino a la boda.

translation.en: And how did you get Brian McKnight to show up?
You ain't gonna believe it.
I actually helped him write a song. It's gonna be on the new album.
translation.es: Lo ayudé con una canción para su nuevo disco.

translation.en: - Oh, my God. - It's no big deal though, you know.
translation.es: - Por Dios. - Pero no es nada.

translation.en: You know what? You're right. I don't believe you.
Oh, you hater.
Oh, you mad 'cause Brian McKnight made me his muse.
translation.es: Estás enojada porque soy la musa de Brian McKnight.

translation.en: You know, Rob, there is one thing you forgot to do today.
translation.es: Rob, hay algo que olvidaste hacer hoy.

translation.en: No, I'm pretty sure I did everything, or else we wouldn't be here right now.
translation.es: No. Sé que hice todo, o no estaríamos aquí.

translation.en: Unh- unh. You forgot to check the numbers.
- Ah, the numbers, right, right. - Yeah, come on.
- Okay, here we go. - All right, so did we win?
- Yes, we most certainly did. - Yes!
I just didn't pick the right numbers...
but I picked the right girl.
translation.es: pero elegí a la chica correcta.

translation.en: Oh, baby. You know what? There is always next month.
translation.es: Amor, tal vez el mes que viene.

translation.en: No, I don't have time next month.
translation.es: No tengo tiempo el mes que viene.

translation.en: You are now looking at the new full- time English lit teacher over at Larkin Prep.
translation.es: Estás viendo al nuevo profesor a tiempo completo de la escuela Larkin.

translation.en: - Are you serious? Really? - Yeah.
Baby, that's amazing!
- That's amazing. - Yeah.
Ladies and gentlemen, it's my great pleasure to introduce
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, es un honor presentarles

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Robert Anderson as they enjoy their first dance together.
translation.es: al Sr. y la Sra. Anderson en su primer baile juntos.

translation.en: Baby, are you sure you still want to do this?
It is a really important moment.
You know, it's the centerpiece to the whole reception.
translation.es: Es la parte central de la recepción.

translation.en: Well, you missed a few lessons.
And I'm really sorry about that.
But I plan on making it up to you.
translation.es: Pero te lo voy a compensar.

translation.en: Where the hell did you learn that?
I found some time.
Excuse me. This is a wedding. Why don't y'all get out here and dance?
translation.es: Disculpen. Es una boda. ¿Por qué no vienen a bailar?

translation.en: Come on, that's what this dance floor is for. Yeah.
translation.es: Vamos, para eso es la pista de baile. Sí.

translation.en: What happened when you broke into the solo, though?
translation.es: ¿Pero qué pasó cuando hiciste tu solo?

translation.en: So did you have fun?
Oh, it was all right.
All right?
We got married, Brian McKnight sang your favorite song.
translation.es: Nos casamos y Brian McKnight cantó tu favorita.

translation.en: - That was incredible. - What more do you want?
Uh, well, you know. When we get to the room, I can show you.
translation.es: Cuando subamos a la habitación te mostraré.

translation.en: You have no idea how long I've been waiting to hear that.
translation.es: No tienes idea cuánto esperé que dijeras eso.

translation.en: Mm, come on.
You know, let's just take the stairs.
- You sure? - Yeah.
Oh, you gonna try to cheat? Oh!
